statement.p: In 37.04 of the last 27 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{27}}={0.3704}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{27}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3704}\cdot{27}={10.0008}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 27-10.0008=16.9992 We round that as requested to 17.
